item.title: Walgreens says locking up products from shoplifters hurt sales
item.description: Keeping products under lock and key dissuaded customers from purchasing them, Walgreens said in earnings call.

item.title: What the new inflation report means for mortgage rates
item.description: Inflation ticked back up during the last month of the year, which could have an impact on mortgage rates.

item.title: As climate risks mount, U.S. homeowners face soaring insurance bills
item.description: Insurance companies are canceling homeowner policies across the U.S. â€” even in regions that aren't considered climate hot spots.
